gr.fire.ui
Class Alert

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.core.Component
      gr.fire.core.Container
          gr.fire.ui.Alert
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
public class Alert
extends Container
implements CommandListener

The Alert is a utility class that displays an alert box (or popup message). It is basically a Panel with some extra functionallity to make it easy to use as an Alert windo.

Author:
padeler

Constructor Detail

Alert

public Alert(java.lang.String txt,
             javax.microedition.lcdui.Image icon,
             byte type,
             byte defaultSelection)
Constructs an Alert

Parameters:
txt - The message of the alert
icon - The icon displayed
type - The type of the alert (TYPE_INFO, TYPE_WARNING , TYPE_ERROR, TYPE_YESNO, TYPE_YESNOCANCEL)
defaultSelection - The preselected button (USER_SELECTED_OK, USER_SELECTED_NO, USER_SELECTED_CANCEL)
